product_name: Salomon Kalalau Running Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight, breathable and cushioning, the men's Salomon Kalalau Running Shoes transition easily from a day hike or jog to a social gathering with friends. Quick-drying, breathable mesh combines with nylon for excellent breathability and abrasion resistance. Quicklace(TM) lacing system with friction-free eyelets takes just a single pull for a perfect fit; lace pocket hides lacing away. OS Tendon thermoplastic urethane frames run along the outsoles of the shoes to facilitate better heel-to-toe transitions and push-off efficiency. Endofit(TM) internal fit sleeves hug the feet in exaclty the right places for excellent comfort. Molded EVA midsoles provide lightweight cushioning and stability. Removable Ortholite(R) footbeds enhance comfort by adding shock absorption; antimicrobial treatment deters odors. Nonmarking Mountainlife Contagrip(R) rubber outsoles provide great traction on a variety of surfaces, from sidewalks to trails. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight, breathable and cushioning, the men's Salomon Kalalau Running Shoes transition easily from a day hike or jog to a social gathering with friends.
